inclusion.criterion: Subject is a male or female >18 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent can be obtained for participation in this study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has taken any antihistamines or anticholinergics within the past 12 hours.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who are unable to ambulate.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe bone pain, likely due to sickle cell disease. No splenomegaly detected.
